headline: ‘Hold Me Back, Hold Me Back… What a Joke!’ J.D. Vance Slams Josh Mandel Over Macho Posturing at Debate
author: Michael Luciano
sentences:
Subscribe to
The race for the Republican nomination for U.S. Senate in Ohio became even uglier on Friday night when Josh Mandel got into the face of Mike Gibbons, threatened him, and called him a pussy.

Goddamn, this is ridiculous.”
Later in the debate, Vance, who served in Iraq with the Marine Corps, returned to the incident and said this:
I just gotta comment on what we just saw.

“I have worked, sir,” Mandel yelled, getting up from his seat.
This guy wants to be a U.S. senator and he’s up here, “Hold me back, hold me back, I got two tours in the Marine Corps!” What a joke!
Look, as the only other person who’s served his country in uniform, I enlisted in the United States Marine Corps.
Mike Gibbons and Josh Mandel get in each other’s faces at tonight’s GOP #OHSen forum hosted by FreedomWorks.
At one point during the debate, Gibbons commanded the floor while the other candidates remained seated.

You watch what happens.”

“Two tours in Iraq, don’t tell me I haven’t worked.”
“You don’t know squat,” Gibbons said.
My grandma had six children, three of them enlisted in the United States Marine Corps.
A businessman, Gibbons remarked that Mandel hasn’t worked in the private sector.
Vance went on to answer a question he’d been asked about Russia and Ukraine.
His comment sent Mandel, a former state treasurer and Marine, into a tizzy.

“You back off.”
Mandel proceeded to threaten Gibbons, a much older person.
I think the way you use the U.S. Marine Corps, Josh, is disgraceful.
